## During Class

::: callout-important
-   Install latest version of RStudio (https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download)

-   Install Quarto: https://quarto.org/docs/download/

    -   Follow: <https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/hello/rstudio.html>

-  Sign up for free github account

-  Install Github Desktop: <https://docs.github.com/en/desktop/installing-and-configuring-github-desktop/installing-and-authenticating-to-github-desktop/installing-github-desktop>

- Install Git: <https://git-scm.com/downloads>

- Make sure RStudio recognized Git: <https://happygitwithr.com/rstudio-see-git.html#rstudio-see-git>
:::
